trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class indicates that access control for the requests be interpreted as though the requests are performed by the security principal identified by the <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" /> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> indica che il controllo di accesso per le richieste venga interpretato come se la richiesta fosse effettuata dall'entità di sicurezza identificata dalla proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor(System.String)" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> class using the specified parameter.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.#ctor(System.String)" /> crea un'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest" /> mediante il parametro specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" /> property contains the security principal.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.Principal" /> contiene l'entità di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> method transforms an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> object into its DSML v2 XML representation.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <see cref="M:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DsmlAuthRequest.ToXmlNode(System.Xml.XmlDocument)" /> trasforma un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDocument" /> nella relativa rappresentazione XML DSML v2.
